name: nextra-theme-docs
description: A Nextra theme for documentation sites.
author: Shu Ding <g@shud.in>

scripts.build: yarn run build:clean && yarn run build:tailwind && yarn run build:layout
scripts.build:layout: cross-env NODE_ENV=production microbundle src/*.js -f cjs -o dist --no-sourcemap --jsx React.createElement --target node
scripts.build:tailwind: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn postcss src/styles.css -o style.css --verbose
scripts.dev:layout: microbundle watch src/*.js -f cjs -o dist --no-sourcemap --jsx React.createElement --target node
